title: Vasa Irregular Shape #3 Sculpture
description:
This sculpture is simply one of the most striking pieces you will ever own. Formed and faceted from clear acrylic, the thin slices of color layered within cast a variegated pattern of light. Created and individually signed by artist Vasa Velizar Mihich in his Los Angeles studio.

6 x 3 ½ x 1 ½ in.
